Message.Title: 79% probability GOOG 5% in next 60 trading days
Message.Msg: Yahoo has moved at least 10% within last 30 trading days, historically since 1/1/2004, whenever this has happened, GOOG has moved at least 5% up in the next 60 trading days, 79% of the times. Ocurrences: 240/302 = 79% -DatumIQ

Message.Msg: - $ 32,859,000,000.00 Billion loss for Google vs Vringo + 100% gains since April 2012 when shareprice was below $2.00 A couple more blows to Google and there goes another -$100.00 a share. Sure glad to see the revenue numbers for their ads still sustaining so we'll ( Vringo shareholders) get our share regardless. Shouldn't be to long before many more Mark Cuban's start acting in the same manner, buying Vringo shares to hedge against more Google downside. Those who held will be willing to let a few go at around $20.00 to the scavengers by next year when they come a running! Topic.Title: 8000% on KROGER and (ATTD) deal, Phase III Recover drink ATTD's product will now be sold in KROGER

Message.Msg: Attitude Drinks Incorporated (Attitude) is a development-stage company. The Company focuses on the non-alcoholic single serving beverage business, developing and marketing of milk based products in two segments: sports recovery and functional dairy. The Company does not directly manufacture its products but instead outsources the manufacturing process to third party packers. Attitude has developed its second product, which is branded as Phase III Recovery. ATTD HAS IMMENSE POTENTIAL. WILL SOON BREAKOUT DUE TO NEW INVESTOR INTEREST, BASED ON KROGER DEAL.
